name: YT Winamp Playlist Player
description: Winamp-like YouTube playlist player with optional always-on-top PiP controls. Open on an active YouTube video/playlist to take control.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; img-src 'self' https: data:; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com;
